target: Would you like to watch The Art of Racing in the Rain?
context: <user>  Hi, is there a salon I can visit? <system>  Which city are you looking at? <user>  Something in Santa Rosa is great. <system>  There are 9 salons you might like in Santa Rosa, how about Daredevils & Queens? <user>  Sounds great to me! <system>  Do you need an appointment there? <user>  Perhaps at a later time. Could you get me a 3D Play movie at 3rd Street Cinema in that area please? <system>
